name: A minimal approach to software architecture documentation

people.name: Customer Service Staff
people.description: Customer service staff within the bank.

people.name: Personal Banking Customer
people.description: A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.

relationships.description: Views account balances, and makes payments using
Views account balances, and makes payments using
Views account balances, and makes payments using

people.name: Back Office Staff
people.description: Administration and support staff within the bank.

softwareSystems.name: Mainframe Banking System
softwareSystems.description: Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc.

softwareSystems.name: E-mail System
softwareSystems.description: The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.

softwareSystems.name: Internet Banking System
softwareSystems.description: Allows customers to view information about their bank accounts, and make payments.

relationships.description: Gets account information from, and makes payments using

containers.name: Mobile
containers.description: Provides a limited subset of the Internet banking functionality to customers via their mobile device.

containers.name: Database
containers.description: Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs, etc.

containers.name: Single-Page Application
containers.description: Provides all of the Internet banking functionality to customers via their web browser.

containers.name: Web Application
containers.description: Delivers the static content and the Internet banking single page application.

relationships.description: Delivers to the customer's web browser

containers.name: API Application
containers.description: Provides Internet banking functionality via a JSON/HTTPS API.

components.name: Accounts Summary Controller
components.description: Provides customers with a summary of their bank accounts.

components.name: Sign In Controller
components.description: Allows users to sign in to the Internet Banking System.

components.name: Reset Password Controller
components.description: Allows users to reset their passwords with a single use URL.

components.name: Mainframe Banking System Facade
components.description: A facade onto the mainframe banking system.

components.name: Security Component
components.description: Provides functionality related to signing in, changing passwords, etc.

decisions.title: Record architecture decisions
decisions.content:
# 1. Record architecture decisions

Date: 2023-06-12

## Status

Accepted

## Context

We need to record the architectural decisions made on this project.

## Decision

We will use Architecture Decision Records, as [described by Michael Nygard](http://thinkrelevance.com/blog/2011/11/15/documenting-architecture-decisions).

## Consequences

See Michael Nygard's article, linked above. For a lightweight ADR toolset, see Nat Pryce's [adr-tools](https://github.com/npryce/adr-tools).
